trans-unit.target: 注意：此 API 现已过时。

trans-unit.source: Applies a shadow behind a visual object at a slight offset.
trans-unit.target: 在视觉对象后的轻微偏移量处应用阴影。

trans-unit.source: The offset is determined by mimicking a casting shadow from an imaginary light source.
trans-unit.target: 偏移量是通过模仿来自虚构光源的投射阴影确定的。
[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_wpf](~/includes/tla2sharptla-wpf-md.md)] 位图效果都是呈现的软件。

trans-unit.source: Any object that applies an effect will also be rendered in software.
trans-unit.target: 应用效果的任何对象也都将以软件形式呈现。

trans-unit.source: Bitmap effects should not be applied to large visuals or animations because this can degrade performance.
trans-unit.target: 不应将位图效果应用于大型视觉对象或动画，因为这样做会降低性能。

trans-unit.source: for creating an instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Effects.DropShadowBitmapEffect" /> class.

trans-unit.target: 注意：此 API 现已过时。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Effects.DropShadowBitmapEffect" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Effects.DropShadowBitmapEffect" /> 类的新实例。
注意：此 API 现已过时。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Effects.DropShadowBitmapEffect" />, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 创建此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Effects.DropShadowBitmapEffect" /> 的可修改克隆，从而深度复制此对象的值。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 在复制依赖项属性时，此方法会复制资源引用和数据绑定（但可能不再解析），但不复制动画或其当前值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true." />
trans-unit.target: 即使源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性为 <see langword="true." />，所克隆的对象的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性也将为 <see langword="false" />

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的版本。
注意：此 API 现已过时。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Effects.DropShadowBitmapEffect" /> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 创建此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Effects.DropShadowBitmapEffect" /> 对象的可修改复本，从而深度复制此对象的当前值。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不复制资源引用、数据绑定和动画，而是复制其当前值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 即使源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性为 <see langword="true" />，所克隆的对象的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性也将为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的版本。
注意：此 API 现已过时。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the color of the shadow.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置阴影的颜色。

trans-unit.source: The alpha value of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Color> structure is ignored by this property.
To set the amount of transparency (alpha) of the color, use the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.DropShadowBitmapEffect.Opacity%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要设置的颜色的透明度 (alpha) 量，请使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.DropShadowBitmapEffect.Opacity%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The following illustration demonstrates the effect of this property.
trans-unit.target: 下图演示此属性的效果。

trans-unit.source: ![Screenshot: Compare shadow color property values](~/add/media/effects-dropshadowcolor.png "Screenshot: Compare shadow color property values")
trans-unit.target: ![屏幕快照： 比较阴影颜色属性值](~/add/media/effects-dropshadowcolor.png "屏幕快照： 比较阴影颜色属性值")
注意：此 API 现已过时。
注意：此 API 现已过时。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the angle at which the shadow is cast.
The angle at which the shadow is cast.
The valid range of values is from 0 through 360.
The value 0 puts the direction immediately to the right of the object.
trans-unit.target: 值 0 将方向置于对象紧右侧。

trans-unit.source: Subsequent values move the direction around the object in a counter-clockwise direction.
trans-unit.target: 后续值将绕对象沿逆时针方向移动方向。

trans-unit.source: For example, a value of 90 indicates the shadow is cast directly upward from the object; a value of 180 is cast directly to the left of the object, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果值为 90，则表示阴影直接投射到对象的上方；如果值为 180，则阴影直接投射到对象的左侧，依此类推。

trans-unit.source: The following diagram shows in which direction the shadow is cast for a given value of this property.
trans-unit.target: 下图显示的方向阴影被强制转换为此属性的给定值。
![示意图： DropShadow 方向](~/add/media/effects-dropshadowdirection2.png "示意图： DropShadow 方向")

trans-unit.source: The following illustration demonstrates the effect of this property.
trans-unit.target: 下图演示此属性的效果。
![屏幕快照： 比较阴影方向](~/add/media/effects-dropshadowdirection.png "屏幕快照： 比较阴影方向")
注意：此 API 现已过时。
注意：此 API 现已过时。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the graininess, or "noise level," of the shadow.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置阴影的粒度或“噪音级别”。

trans-unit.source: The noise level of the shadow.
The valid range of values is from 0 through 1.
A value of 0 indicates no noise and 1 indicates maximum noise.
trans-unit.target: 值为 0 表示没有噪点，值为 1 表示最大噪点。

trans-unit.source: A value of 0.5 indicates 50 percent noise, a value of 0.75 indicates 75 percent noise, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 值 0.5 表示 50% 噪音，值 0.75 表示 75% 噪音，依此类推。

trans-unit.source: The following illustration demonstrates the effect of this property.
trans-unit.target: 下图演示此属性的效果。

trans-unit.source: ![Screenshot: Compare Noise property values](~/add/media/effects-dropshadownoise.png "Screenshot: Compare Noise property values")
trans-unit.target: ![屏幕快照： 比较 Noise 属性值](~/add/media/effects-dropshadownoise.png "屏幕快照： 比较 Noise 属性值")
注意：此 API 现已过时。
注意：此 API 现已过时。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the degree of opacity of the shadow.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置阴影的不透明度。

trans-unit.source: The valid range of values is from 0 through 1.
A value of 0 indicates that the shadow is completely transparent, and a value of 1 indicates that the shadow is completely opaque.
trans-unit.target: 如果值为 0，则表示阴影完全透明；如果值为 1，则表示阴影完全不透明。

trans-unit.source: A value of 0.5 indicates the shadow is 50 percent opaque, a value of 0.725 indicates the shadow is 72.5 percent opaque, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 如果值为 0.5，则表示阴影不透明度为 50%；如果值为 0.725，则表示阴影不透明度为 72.5%，依此类推。

trans-unit.source: Values less than 0 are treated as 0, while values greater than 1 are treated as 1.
trans-unit.target: 小于 0 的值将被视为 0，而大于 1 的值将被视为 1。

trans-unit.source: This property must be used to set the opacity of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.DropShadowBitmapEffect> because the alpha level component of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.DropShadowBitmapEffect.Color%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 必须使用此属性设置的不透明度<xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.DropShadowBitmapEffect>因为级别的 alpha 分量<xref:System.Windows.Media.Effects.DropShadowBitmapEffect.Color%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>忽略属性。

trans-unit.source: The following illustration demonstrates the effect of this property.
trans-unit.target: 下图演示此属性的效果。
![具有标注的屏幕快照： DropShadowBitmapEffect](~/add/media/effects-dropshadowopacity.png "具有标注的屏幕快照： DropShadowBitmapEffect")
注意：此 API 现已过时。
注意：此 API 现已过时。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the distance between the object and the shadow that it casts.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置对象与其投影间的距离。

trans-unit.source: The distance between the plane of the object casting the shadow and the shadow plane measured in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 投影对象的平面与阴影平面之间的距离，以 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] 为度量单位。

trans-unit.source: The valid range of values is from 0 through 300.
The following illustration demonstrates the effect of this property.
trans-unit.target: 下图演示此属性的效果。

trans-unit.source: ![Screenshot: Compare ShadowDepth property values](~/add/media/effects-dropshadowshadowdepth.png "Screenshot: Compare ShadowDepth property values")
trans-unit.target: ![屏幕快照： 比较 ShadowDepth 属性值](~/add/media/effects-dropshadowshadowdepth.png "屏幕快照： 比较 ShadowDepth 属性值")
注意：此 API 现已过时。
注意：此 API 现已过时。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the softness of the shadow.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置阴影的柔和度。

trans-unit.source: The valid range of values is from 0 through 1.
A value of 0.0 indicates no softness (a sharply defined shadow) and 1.0 indicates maximum softness (a very diffused shadow).
trans-unit.target: 值 0.0 表示无柔和度（非常清晰的阴影），1.0 表示最大柔和度（非常模糊的阴影）。

trans-unit.source: A value of 0.5 indicates 50 percent softness, a value of 0.75 indicates 75 percent softness, and so on.
trans-unit.target: 值 0.5 表示 50% 的柔和度，值 0.75 表示 75% 的柔和度，依此类推。

trans-unit.source: The following illustration demonstrates the effect of this property.
trans-unit.target: 下图演示此属性的效果。

trans-unit.source: ![Screenshot: Compare Softness property values](~/add/media/effects-dropshadowsoftness.png "Screenshot: Compare Softness property values")
trans-unit.target: ![屏幕快照： 比较 Softness 属性值](~/add/media/effects-dropshadowsoftness.png "屏幕快照： 比较 Softness 属性值")
注意：此 API 现已过时。
